Value.Item: I buy and sell all manner\nof things.
Too bad you don't have a\nmerchant to send it to.
What do you want to sell?
Come back soon, and be\nsure to tell your friends!
Don't loiter around, then.\nI got a business to run.
Looks like you're full.\nSend it to <merchant>?
No? Too bad. You could\ntake it if you made room.
What can I get for you?
I have nothing left to sell.
If you had a merchant,\nI could send it there...
Anything else I can do\nfor you?
Thank you for your custom.\nDrop in again!
I see. Then be sure to return\nif you change your mind.
Your hands are full.\nSend it to <merchant>?
That's a shame. You could\ncarry it if you made room.
Change some units' missions on the first turn
On the following turns, spawn Pegs
If reinforcements have spawned twice, end event
If reinforcements have spawned twice, end event
